markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Standard">[Summon Elemental](/Spells.aspx?ID=320)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 375 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Deities**
[Ayrzul](/Deities.aspx?ID=102), [Hshurha](/Deities.aspx?ID=103), [Kelizandri](/Deities.aspx?ID=104), [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=108)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You conjure an elemental to fight for you. This works like [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316), except you summon a common creature that has the [elemental](/Traits.aspx?ID=57) trait and whose level is 1 or lower, such as those below.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2.

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3.

**Heightened (5th)** Level 5.

**Heightened (6th)** Level 7.

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9.

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11.

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13.

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15.
name: Summon Elemental

summary_markdown: Conjure an elemental to fight on your behalf.
text: Summon Elemental Source Core Rulebook pg. 375 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Deities Ayrzul, Hshurha, Kelizandri, Ymeri Cast Three Actions material, somatic, verbal Range 30 feet Duration sustained up to 1 minute --- You conjure an elemental to fight for you. This works like summon animal , except you summon a common creature that has the elemental trait and whose level is 1 or lower, such as those below. --- Heightened (3rd) Level 2. Heightened (4th) Level 3. Heightened (5th) Level 5. Heightened (6th) Level 7. Heightened (7th) Level 9. Heightened (8th) Level 11. Heightened (9th) Level 13. Heightened (10th) Level 15.
